detaileddescription.para: Function to extract numeric value from a data object.
Function to extract string label from a data object.
Optional function to determine color for a slice. Falls back to internal scale if omitted.
Width of the SVG canvas. Default: 300.
Height of the SVG canvas. Default: 300.

memberdef.name: let
memberdef.initializer: { data, valueAccessor, labelAccessor, colorAccesor, width = 300, height = 300, }: Props = $props()

detaileddescription.para: @component @description A reusable Pie/Donut Chart component using D3.js. Supports custom labeling, value accessors, and external legends.
